üìù How to Apply

Application Process: SSC Online Examination

  1. Check official notification for eligibility
  2. Fill online application form
  3. Pay application fees
  4. Download admit card
  5. Appear for written examination
  6. Document verification for selected candidates
  7. Final merit list and posting

‚ùì Frequently Asked Questions

What is the exact in-hand salary?

In metro cities: ‚Çπ47,435, Major cities: ‚Çπ45,395, Other places: ‚Çπ43,355

Are there annual increments?

Yes, annual increments are given every year. DA is revised twice yearly based on inflation.
